attributes.action: Prevent resignation from EU until after a general election.
attributes.additional_details:
The current Conservative manifesto details no plans on how to handle an exit of membership of the European Union.  Therefore, they have no mandate on how to handle negotiations to effect a BREXIT.

The Conservative Party manifesto can be found at:
https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/manifesto2015/ConservativeManifesto2015.pdf
attributes.background: Stop the government invoking article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty until such time as a party manifesto detailing any BREXIT plans has been approved by the electorate through means of a general election.
